header.name: Branden Vennes
header.summary: Experienced Full Stack Developer with 6+ years building scalable web applications and APIs across diverse industries including streaming media, blockchain, and construction technology. Proven expertise in modern frontend and backend technologies, cloud platforms, and data integration. Strong track record of designing event-driven architectures, optimizing application performance, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative solutions.

experience.title: Software Engineer II
experience.detail: Designed and developed the Streaming Data Platform schema registry and event streaming infrastructure using Scala, AWS Kinesis, DynamoDB, and IAM
Built stream-snapshot state management system enabling teams to maintain application state from event streams, integrated into the company's content metadata unification project
Architected schema validation and build pipelines using Jenkins and GitHub Actions with complex compatibility checks ensuring zero-downtime deployments
Migrated schema definitions from OpenAPI to AWS Smithy, improving data payload validation and reducing runtime errors by 40%
Generated multi-language SDKs (Scala, Java, Python) with JSON and Protobuf serialization support, enabling seamless cross-team integration
Optimized Kinesis consumer applications using DynamoDB for state management, achieving 99.9% uptime for critical streaming data pipelines

experience.title: Blockchain Platform Engineer
experience.detail: Developed a core proof-of-stake blockchain platform using Scala, Akka actors, and TCP networking for supply chain verification
Built a RESTful management API enabling node operators to manage cryptographic keys and monitor blockchain operations
Created transaction streaming service using http4s, Cats Effect, and MongoDB with a Protobuf API for real-time blockchain data queries
Developed a React UI providing blockchain query capabilities for non-technical users

experience.title: Software Engineer I & II
experience.detail: Developed full-stack features for a construction project management web application using C# .NET microservices, MSSql databases, and modern frontend technologies including Angular and RxJS
Architected a cutting-edge Event Sourced change management system, storing user interactions as events and deriving application state from event data
Integrated a project management application with an enterprise resource planning system, enabling seamless data synchronization for construction project management workflows
Deployed applications to Azure cloud platform with automated CI/CD pipelines

experience.title: QA Automation Engineer
experience.detail: Designed and implemented an automated testing framework using C# and Selenium, reducing manual testing effort by 75%
Developed an API testing suite for microservices validation and implemented performance testing coverage providing consistent feedback to development teams
Created maintainable test automation solutions enabling non-technical team members to write and execute comprehensive test suites
